list_definition.definition: a flavouring/flavoring taken from a type of plant and used in sweets etc
(sometimes abbreviated to mint) a sweet flavoured/flavored with peppermint

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The little boy had a bag of peppermints.

list_ex_of_english: They contain only three ingredients: sugar, glucose, and peppermint oil.
